title: SEO Business & Affilate Network For Sale
text: - Website builds & sales o Example: Built up a few websites and sold for more than US$ 100,000 The sale is made up of the entire affiliate network including its domains, websites, content, hosting and IT infrastructure, suppliers/contacts/business relationships and other associated intellectual property. The sale will also include a fully professional handover with two months of free support to ensure a succesful migration. This diverse network is made up of elements of affiliate marketing, lead generation, online advertising and SEO advice. Due to the combination of different niches as well as Marketing channels it has grown to be a robust online business allowing to mitigate business risks for e.g. ï¿½putting all eggs in one basket''. The revenues over the last 12 months amount to approx. US$ 350,000 and are split as follows (estimated): - Advertising and affiliate commissions: US$ 60,000 - Website sales: US$ 150,000 - Site Network sale: US$ 140,000 The costs on the other hand are marginal, equating to approx. US$ 30,000 per annum, allowing a very high net profit. The costs incorparte the following activities: - SEO (e.g. Link building and content) - Infrastructure (e.g. Hosting) - It requires approx. 1-2 fulltime employees The websites of this network are made up of the following metrics (on average): - approx 150,000+ visitors a month - Google PR ranges from 0 to 3 The selling price of the entire network is US$ 140,000.00. The reason for the sale of the network is due to the fact that we are looking for funding for a project outside of this sector. Financials
